adrFormatAddress: 505 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10013-1380, USA

originalText.text: Yotam is my go-to for effective healing. Me and my family have been going to Yotam for years, and we're huge fans. Yotam excels at tailoring each session to your needs and truly is a "fixer" not just a massage therapist. His technique comes from a solid understanding of different methods, making him a true expert. I'm quite active in sports and often deal with lower back pain. Thanks to Yotam's skills, I found relief and continued my workouts without issues. Yotam's knowledge about the body is impressive if you're looking for effective healing. It's definitely worth the investment.

originalText.text: Yotam is truly an incredible human. He is evidently extremely knowledgeable in his craft and engages in his work with the most integrity. He is also a very compassionate and personable individual and made me feel comfortable and cared for throughout my appointment. As a dancer and general stress case, I came in with a variety of physical and psychological aches that Yotam was successfully able to address. I walked out of my session truly feeling like the weight of the world had been lifted off of me and much more in alignment with my body. This was easily the best massage I have ever had!!!

originalText.text: Meeting & Working with Yotam has changed my life. The quality of everything I do and share with my community, family and friends has been elevated. If you enter your session with pain you will leave either without that pain or much less and a plan of how to go about alleviating it over a period of time. The treatment, care and vibration that Yotam functions at is unparalleled. He brings a lifetime of knowledge about movement, body mechanics and plant medicine to his practice as a former professional modern dancer from a family of modern dancers. Meeting and working with him and his care team has allowed me to regain health, wellness & vitality during a time when traditional western medicine doctors were offering chiropractic care, followed by potential back surgery followed by more chiro care and PT as a permanent solution. Thank you Yotam and team. I am forever humbled and grateful. ✨✨✨

originalText.text: Mudra has hands gifted in the arts of restoration. Firm, soothing and absolutely necessary. From the environment to the body work, Mudra provides an experience that should become part of any athlete’s routine

text.text: Mudra has hands gifted in the arts of restoration. Firm, soothing and absolutely necessary. From the environment to the body work, Mudra provides an experience that should become part of any athlete’s routine

originalText.text: I was the type of person that hated massages with a passion. After some prolonged pain (and a little insistence from my wife) I decided to try Mudras and I have to say it was a life changer, for real. The massage is meant to help the body heal and in my experience it did. You should not have doubts about the massage's efficacy, Yotam is doing his absolute best to help and improve whatever your body is going through. It's so, so worth it.
